types.html:
ni plus ni moins

  1. neither more nor less; no more no less; quite simply
    Synonyms: tout simplement, tout bonnement
    Je ne veux ni plus ni moins. ― I don't want any more or any less.
    • 1965, Palémon Glorieux, Aux origines de la Sorbonne, page 96:
      […] mais on ne reçoit alors ni plus ni moins que sa portion régulière.
      […] in that case one receives no more or less than one's regular portion.

title: ni plus ni moins
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ni ply ni mwɛ̃/
